snippet.title: Restaurant Recipes | BackStreet Cafe Mushroom Wild Rice Soup
snippet.description: Linda Belich, Mukwonago , requested the recipe for a mushroom and wild rice soup from BackStreet Café, 2566 Sun Valley Drive, Delafield. She wrote: "This absolutely the best soup I have ever had. Full of mouth watering flavor yet not overly salty. It is a meal in itself.
